title: Community member does not loose permissions in case if he doesn't hold enough tokens anymore

milestone.title: 1.27.0 - Alpha
milestone.description:
### This release *might* be the release that becomes Status Mobile's first public alpha

Mobile dev team priorities In priority order:

**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 1.26 cycle**

**2. Fix bugs, both functional and UX fit-and-finish defects.**  

- specifically focus on bugs related to the Communities functionality, when a community is utilizing all the community admin functionality available in Status Desktop

- any remaining UX quality defects

**3. Complete building any Communities functionality that's in the MVP Communities designs and not yet built**  

**4. Work on any outstanding ad-hoc group chat functionality as per the MVP spec**  

- Test with Status Desktop to ensure mobile and desktop interop in all aspects of ad-hoc group chat functionality.


**--- Things that should NOT be worked on this cycle ---**

- We shouldn't start anything in Settings or Profile related, with the exception of Wallet setting that the Mobile Wallet team may work on.

body: As an example let's take the case when token gated community has set one permission: user should hold 1 STT to become a member. **Preconditions:** Mobile user possesses the required amount of 1 STT **Steps:** 1. Admin shares community to Mobile user 2. Mobile user joins the community 3. Mobile user performs transaction so he does not possess the required 1 STT amount anymore 4. See if Mobile user has been kicked from token gated community **Actual result:** Mobile user remains community member. He can send and receive messages in the community despite he does not meet permission requirements anymore. I have also checked the case when permissions are changed by admin and in this case user is successfully being kicked if he does not meet the new requirements. **Expected result:** Mobile user should be kicked out of token gated community as he does not meet permission requirements anymore. [mobile_user_logs.zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/files/13350730/mobile_user_logs.zip) ![photo_2023-11-14 17 26 33](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/97245802/4ea3cdc3-45b7-483b-99a8-f5db8875aa0e) https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/97245802/10282141-2cb3-4e05-baae-ccd9dcc1d284 ### Additional Information - Status version: nightly - Operating System: Android, iOS [comment]: # (Please, add logs/notes if necessary)
